stock.title: Stock Market
stock.desc: Updating foundational knowledge for beginners, with a simple, easy-to-understand analytical approach and gradual market familiarization.

realEstate.title: Real Estate
realEstate.desc: Synthesizing ongoing projects nationwide, updating price levels by region, and analyzing real estate businesses through actual project portfolios.

macro.title: Macroeconomics
macro.desc: Analyzing the impact of economic policies in Vietnam on specific sectors, updating operating interest rates and monetary/foreign exchange policies to propose potential sectors for each stage.

mindset.title: Financial Mindset
mindset.desc: Designing a complete roadmap for beginner investors, especially office workers, helping access financial knowledge in an easy-to-understand way and applying it effectively in practice.

feedback.title: Customer
feedback.loginRequired: Please sign in to send feedback!

about.title: About
about.desc1: YT2Future is built on the belief that a sustainable financial future begins with agile thinking and a spirit of continuous innovation. We provide investment knowledge, market analysis, and curated financial information, aiming to help readers understand the true nature of investment and make decisions based on long-term thinking.
about.desc2: YT2Future wishes to accompany the community on a journey of learning, adapting, and creating the future through knowledge.

explore.title: Core
explore.desc: We focus on core market sectors where innovation is happening most vigorously.

about.headline: Shaping tomorrow through agile thinking and continuous innovation.
about.description: YT2Future is built on the belief that sustainable financial future begins with agile thinking and continuous innovation. We provide curated investment knowledge, market analysis, and financial information, aiming to help readers understand the true nature of investing and make decisions based on long-term thinking. YT2Future aspires to accompany the community on the journey of learning, adapting, and shaping the future through knowledge.

knowledge.title: KNOWLEDGE SYSTEM
knowledge.desc: Sharing knowledge and experience distilled from learning and investment practice.

thinking.title: ANALYTICAL THINKING
thinking.desc: Training multi-dimensional market perspective, from macro to enterprise fundamentals.

community.title: COMMUNITY CONNECTION
community.desc: Building an open learning community where all perspectives are respected and debated.
